value.name: A COVID-19 test that gives results in 15 minutes without a lab has been cleared for use in Europe
value.description: Troy Kirkpatrick, a spokesperson for Becton Dickinson, said that a new clinical study shows the test correctly identifies infections 93.5% of the time, whilst the rate of correct negative results ...

value.name: BD Launches Industry First Ready-to-Use Iodine-Based Surgical Irrigation System
value.description: troy.kirkpatrick@bd.com kristen.stewart@bd.com Indication for use: BD Surgiphor™ Sterile Wound Irrigation System is a wound cleansing delivery system intended to loosen and remove wound debris.
